The more I look into this the more disturbing it gets. 🇨🇳 PF patroling in Italy, Croatia & Serbia.Apparently sacrificing sovereignty for RMB has become a 🌐 trend.

They say it is for the growing number of tourists and workers in the countries.

I would understand training/sharing sessions and workshops. But petroling? The only reason I can think of is display of Chinese influence and sovereignty over its "vassal states".

Such acts would make future expansionist policies so much easier once foreign countries get used to seeing Chinese forces walking around in plain sight.

We should all be alarmed.
